# LineGradient

**Class**

A line that displays with a gradient along the length of the line.

## Declaration

```swift
class LineGradient
```

## Overview

Use [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/LineGradient] with a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/PolylineOverlay] to show a gradient along a route or path. You can also use it to provide additional information about locations along the path, for example, the running pace along a route.

## Creating a Line Gradient

- **new LineGradient(colorStops)**: Creates a style that renders a gradient along the length of a line.
- **addColorStop(offset, color)**: Adds a color transition point to the gradient.
- **addColorStopAtIndex(index, color)**: Adds a color transition at the index point in the list of points within a polyline.

## Instance Methods

- **toString()**: Returns a string representation of the line gradient object.

## Styling lines

- **lineCap**: The style to use when drawing line endings.
- **lineDash**: An array of line and gap lengths for creating a dashed line.
- **lineDashOffset**: The number of CSS pixels to use as an offset when drawing a line’s dash pattern.
- **lineJoin**: The corner style to apply when joining line segments.
- **lineWidth**: The width of a line’s stroke, in CSS pixels.
- **lineGradient**: The gradient to apply along the line.
